description.zh-CN: [题目131] Partition string into palindromic substrings....
description.zh-TW: [題目131] Partition string into palindromic substrings....
description.ja: [問題131] Partition string into palindromic substrings....

explanation.en: APL solution for Palindrome Partitioning. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Palindrome Partitioning 的 APL 解决方案。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Palindrome Partitioning 的 APL 解決方案。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Palindrome Partitioning. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.es: APL solution for Palindrome Partitioning. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.de: APL solution for Palindrome Partitioning. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
